choices: A Crystal Gem (Garnet, Pearl, Rose, Amethyst)
Your a member of a cult who worships a Diamond, the highest of all gods
Different Storyline (Any other gem you'd like)
1.content: Your one of the "lucky" chosen ones. An inch tall compared to your master but she was kind enough to absorb you into her and make you as immortal as she is. But what Gem owns you?
1.title: Beginings.

11.content:
Connie- a Gift from Rose to Pearl. One of the few humans Pearl will allow to live. How she treats you is up to your choices

Nibbles- Amethyst's infinite snack and personal pet. Due to her...lax attitude, nice enough but also lazy and tends to treat you as a toy

Cupcake- Actually 2 humans that Garnet keeps fused together. One of the better situations, although Ruby can be rough with you when her and Sapphire have a lover's quarrel

Greg- Rose's...well lets be honest, Rose's sex toy.
11.title: A variety of pets!

choices: Amethyst is hungry, time for you to do your job
Your mistress is actually fairly calm today, your mostly just hanging out
She's using you for a pretty degrading task, footrubs.
112.content:
Your not named Nibbles. Your PeeDee. You've told Amethyst this, ever since you were absorbed and she actually could understand what you were saying. But lord did she just NOT CARE what your name was.

You remember when she found you, when you were in the middle of eating for the first time for months, gobbling down some fries you found in the landfill that this purple behemoth considered a bedroom. They were just barely moldy too...now the only thing that gets gobbled down is you.

You've only been Amethyst's pet a relatively short time. About half a year maybe. But she eats and reforms you so often you've already began taking on some of her traits, your hairs gone white and your skin is becoming more and more purple. Its...degrading, reduced to nothing more than a snack...but its not the worst fate.
112.title: Well she does love Frybits

choices: Amethyst presses you down into her breasts
Pretzels aren't cutting it, time for Frybits
1122.content:
Even when Amethyst is kind she does all kinds of things that is a lot more...mutually ridicolous than she needs to make it.


Right now Amethyst is watching the Homeworld entertainment channel and vegging out in front of her tv. She's also placed you between her breasts, squished not totally comfortable against her gem as she barely pays attention to you. At least she's eating something other than you, a bag of pretzels...that she is sloppily eating spilling salt covered crumbs all over you.

Every once and a while she'll give a bored *squish* of her breasts, pressing you on all sides and causing you to let out a squeak. Something she clearly finds hilarious.
1122.title: Thats why they call it Boob Tube

choices: Hunger (She's clearly not listening to you)
11222.content:
Amethyst sighed, her stomach growling. "Man. These really, really suck"

You go as pail as someone with purple skin can. Amethyst...isn't liking her snack. Which usually means...

"Amethyst...please no."

"Oh come on Nibbles, its not that bad."

"Yes it is that bad! Melting into nothingness in darkness surrounded by gurgling noises and barely keeping my head above acid is THAT BAD! And my Name is PeeDee!"

Amethyst gives you a look. A look filled with
11222.title: Time for a "swim"

113.content:
To be honest. Things could be a lot worse for you. Garnet's a pretty chill master as far as Gem's go.

Granted the two of you being one person was weird at first. Fusion isn't something humans are used to, but it only took a little bit for you both to adjust...at least partially.

See, one of the few things of the two components of the Fusion who owns you will split over is how they want to treat you. Ruby is...a bit more mean than Garnet or Sapphire to you. They don't want to hurt you, they just kinda...like to rough you up a bit. Or at least Cup up.

Cake is in the much more favorable position of being the pet of Sapphire when unfused. By fair the gentler of the two
113.title: Two heads are better than one

114.content:
You wake up and everything is soft around you. Some snoring is coming from above you and you see your mistress in a blissful sleep above you, and you immediately realize where you are.

After your uh...fun last night, Rose must of fallen asleep with you between her breasts. Its been a long time since you hadn't had to reform after one of these more wild nights, guess Rose was gentle.

Not that you mind much. A death by Snu Snu is not a horrible way to go, and its much less terrible when you can be instantly brought back.

You suppose you could wake Rose up...but she seems so peaceful, and you could get some rest right now too. What to do here...
114.title: Soft and Warm

12.content:
Order of the Blue Lady: Lapis has a cult of absorbed worshippers, your one of them.

E-22- Your peridot's personal lab rat

Gift- A human given to Jasper...which is the only reason you are still alive

Lil Buddy: Bismuth's favorite helper in the forge

Steven: A pet made with Human DNA and some of Rose Quartz's life force as a cute pet for Spinel and Pink diamond. Unfortunately Spinel doesn't like sharing her spotlight


*Note that in this AU Pink and Rose are different people*
12.title: Other Gems (Lapis, Peridot, Jasper, Bismuth)

choices: Taking part in a particularly excruciating experiment
Enjoying some much appreciated down time
122.content:
You belong to a Peridot researcher stationed on earth, and you name is E-22. That stands for "Experiment Number 22". Experiment 1 through 21 having apparently expired, as Peridot put it. You'd have likely expired by now too, had your owner not discovered a way to assimilate you into her gem. Apparently she isn't supposed to be able to do that, but you weren't about to complain since it was the only thing keeping you alive. What you could complain about were the various tests she was performing on you. She seemed to have gotten awful careless and bold, knowing she could easily be able to bring you back in your base form.

Ever since you came into her possession, you've noticed your body changing. For starters your skin now has a less than healthy looking green tint to it, which probably isn't from any of the tests Peridot has conducted on you. Your hair has also grown to be a more silvery white compared to the original brown, plus it stands up in a weird way on it's own. Most curiously you seem to be getting shorter, despite Peridot insisting she's made no alterations to your base height at any point. Worst of all: Peridot's insatiable hunger for knowledge and experimentation seems to be rubbing off on you...

What exactly are you doing right now?
122.title: Valuable test subject (a.k.a. lab rat)

1221.content:
Right now, you recall what Peridot told you the day she acquired you: "Sacrifices must be made on the road to progress". Turns out, you're the one doing the sacrificing bit over and over and over again... but she always assured you the results were very much worth it, despite how asinine and inane some of the tests seemed?

What sort of test is she conducting right now?
1221.title: suffering for science

123.content:
Gift is one of the lowest humans who's ascended. You're a champion of Yellow Diamond's arena twice over. You've brought your master honor in more then one fight.

So why does Japser use you like this? After you were assimulated you quickly took on Jasper's features. Becoming stronger, the marks of a true quartz begining to appear on you...your even turning orange for pete sake. And yet she still treats you like dirt under her nails like she has since day 1!

Literally today. She's having you do pushups, with her big toe right on your back. You just know at some point she'll get bored and push down, pinning or poofing you.

Or it could be a jog day, with you in her boot

Or she could surprise us all
123.title: Hell on Earth while exercising

choices: Jasper gets bored and presses down
1231.content:
"78...79...80... ... 81 ... ... ... Come on runt! Don't tell me you can't even do one hundred!" Jasper's voice boomed above you.

You're on the cold hard floor doing push ups, your arms tremble like crazy, you're winded and there's a pool of (mostly) your sweat beneath you. You somehow manage to suppress the urge to mumble profanities at your trainer, you could do a hundred push ups easily, were it not for her giant toe weighing you down.

"I'm barely applying ANY pressure here! It's like you don't even want to win the next fight..." Jasper said. Ah of course, the whole reason Jasper has been training you so hard this past week, she doesn't want to look bad in front of her own master: an absolutely massive gem named Yellow Diamond. To be quite honest you really didn't want to loose either, knowing Jasper the punishment for failure would likely be prolonged and agonizing...

"Maybe a little encouragement is in order. If you don't finish your series, i'll press down hard and smear you all over the floor, got it?" Jasper said with a sneer. Every muscle in your body felt like it was on fire, you're not sure you could even do one more...
1231.title: No pain, no gain

choices: She leaves you in there for a few minutes
You spend a few hours in this hellish limbo
12312.content:
You tried to push up again, you really did. The buring pain in your muscles, unfortunately, was just too much, and your arms gave out beneath you, sending you face first into the pool of your and Jasper's sweat.

"Damnit Gift. I thought you were finally getting stronger." She lowers her toe, pinning you down painfully. "Should of known you'd never get strong enough on you own..." A sickening crack rang out as your legs were reduced to a smear and you barely avoid crying out... And then she smeared the rest of you across the floor, and you were in that horrifying limbo where you were just a part of Jasper's gem...


She hates doing this. Everytime she reforms you you get stronger, yes, but more stubborn...and less fun to play with.
12312.title: More like her...

choices: Right hand Pet (Connie's mom) - Yellow Diamond
13.content:
Four diamonds, four greater gods that gems and man alike bowed to. Each one holds dominion over countless gems and countless more human servants and worshippers. Their great powers they can alter a human's size from the size of a normal gem to that of a grain of sand.

But to which diamond do you belong?

White Diamond - The supreme leader of all gemkind. Though she has a dislike for humans, seeing them as inferior lifeforms, she does greatly enjoy the praise they give her. To the point that she keeps hordes of her devoted worshippers in her personal quarters.
You are the Star Priest, the link between White Diamond and the rest of mankind. You are treated like a messiah, and it is up to you to satisfy your colossal goddess, whatever her needs may be

Yellow Diamond - Supreme commander of Homeworld's armies. In her down time, she enjoys watching humans fight in her arenas. Sometimes she uses her powers to grow one of the human contenders and watch them destroy the competition, or to pit fully grown humans against her elite gem soldiers.
You are a woman that was once known as Priyaka Mahenswaran, but you are now known as Yellow Diamond's Right Hand Pet. You have proven yourself time and time again as a worthy champion of your diamond, passing each and every one of the tests she puts you through. As a reward Yellow Diamond has increased your size to that of a regular gem. You are determined to continue improving and proving yourself, which Yellow Diamond enjoys greatly.

Blue Diamond - Originally a benevolent mother like figure, Blue Diamond had once amassed a sizable following of pacifist worshippers. But one day when Blue Diamond was away on important duties, her peaceful followers were slaughtered by a group of misguided cultist who worshipped another unknown gem. Blue Diamond was heartbroken by this, she captured those responsible and forced them to repent by allowing themselves to be tortured and even killed by her. Feeling that even this punishment was not enough, she sentenced the descendants of these humans to continue paying for the wrongdoings of their forefathers.
You are the Guilty, the leader of the band that attacked Blue Diamond's original followers. Blue Diamond had assimilated you with the sole purpose of prolonging your punishment indefinitely.

Pink Diamond - By far the most kind and benevolent of the Diamonds, Pink Diamond owns a zoo whose purpose is to care for and breed humans.
You are Steven, an adorable little pet made from Human and Gem DNA. Sadly, Pink Diamond's close friend and jester Spinel doesn't seem to enjoy sharing the spotlight with you
13.title: Follower of the Diamonds

14.content:
Mama Holly: A human child lived on one of the reserves, his parents the victims of an accidental Squishing. Holly Blue Agate was tasked by her diamond to take care of him, and when her Diamond is at the Reserve, "Mama Holly" can behave quite motherly. However she pawns the brat off to the Famethyst whenever she has the chance to

Personnel Plaything: Rubies don't get given humans often. However the Ruby Squad (Eyeball, Doc, Navy, Leggy, Army) were given a not so favorable job of "guarding" a field far away from anything to break, so the five of them were given a human to play with, and rather than pick one to hold onto him, they absorbed the human while fused. This has...strange consequences

Lar's voyages: Most humans only dream of being off planet, or a pet. Lucky you, little Lars, your both. Unfortunately your master Emerald, while kind enough in General, tends to use you as a Stress toy when something goes wrong. And often many things will go wrong. And sometimes her..."stress relief" is a bit embarrassing for you too

Aquamarine's complex: Your kept very small by your master. An Aquamarine, fairly high ranking...and like most Aquamarines, Short. she has a complex about her size you just know it. And she loves pushing you around to show it

Or, maybe you'd like one of the pearls? BLue, Yellow, Pink. You know them?
14.title: Covering the bases

145.content: perhaps you are the servant of the calm and quiet blue pearl, a mostly aloof goddess whose acknowledgment and love you desire above all things in life?
145.title: Pick a Pearl

info.brief_description: In an alternate Steven Universe, Every gem is huge compared to the largest human!
info.description:
In this universe, the once powerful human race has been reduced to pets, snacks, and playthings for the godlike gems. A select few are assimilated into a gems...well, gem, making them much more durable, long lasting pets that their goddess can bring back after death. Sometimes this is worse for them.

RULES

1-A assimilated human can always be brought back, some gems use this as an excuse to play with them in...creative ways. They can also inherit some gem abilities (EG-fusion. A human absorbed by a Jasper will slowly get stronger, the marks on a Jasper's skin appearing on theres and gaining an orange tint etc). Gems can also alter the human with Shapeshifting post absorption, making them smaller or larger or even changing there appearance.


2- you can have the human be treated in *any* way by their Gem. Although Cruel is prefered.

3- As you may of noticed, we are 18 plus here. However we do have limits. No Farts, scat, piss, male giants or Futa please.
